frontmatter.author: Malong
frontmatter.teaser: Wanna stay warm in those troubled times ? Tune into these sunshine grooves on vinyl straight from Africa, the West Indies, & beyond !
frontmatter.title: Malong - Outernational Soleil

frontmatter.author: Malong
frontmatter.teaser: Vinyl selection of fiery Afro-Latin tunes !
frontmatter.title: Malong - Outernational Fiesta

frontmatter.author: Malong
frontmatter.teaser: Vinyl selection: Funky Breaks, Fuzzy Bass, Ferocious Synths, AfroBoogie, Disco, & Psychedelic cuts !
frontmatter.title: Malong - Outernational Badass

frontmatter.author: Malong
frontmatter.teaser: A vinyl selection of 1960s and 70s Puerto-Rican Bomba, Plena y Salsa, with a few Boricua-infused tunes from Colombia, Congo, Trinidad and the US thrown in for good measure !
frontmatter.title: Malong - Outernational Boricua

frontmatter.author: Malong
frontmatter.teaser: A vinyl selection of Afro-Cuban beats from less expected places like Congo, Haiti, or Guadeloupe, among many !
frontmatter.title: Malong - Outernational Charanga
